item.title: Pothole/ uneven walkway access overgrown with weed and rubble, 23rd July
item.description:
This is the only access to our block of flats .I had reported this both to the housing association and bexley council. It's difficult to access the entrance especially if you are carrying your shopping ,suitcase .A wheelchair user will not be able to access the block. Please help us to resolve this. Some of the pavements and walk way around us have been resurfaced recently. Our block tends to be left behind even with the planting flowers we had to ask

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aspen Green, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: London Road around Blyth Road / Hammelton Road with lots of rubbish and broken bottles, 23rd July
item.description:
I regularly go out litter picking bottles and cans. London Road around Blyth / Hammelton Road and Farwig Lane is strewn with rubbish. There appears to be an area for heavy drinkers as I have collected lots of alcoholic bottles and cans. There is broken glass and loads of rubbish. It is sad to see the streets looking so dirty
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, London Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole covers making loud noise every time a vehicle drives on it, 23rd July
item.description:
Manhole covers making loud noise every time a vehicle drives on it. This has been going on for nearly a year now and nothing has been done about it. Everytime a vehicle drives on the road over the manhole covers they make a very loud noise. This scares my pets and is a noise nuisance at night.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harrow Manorway, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Budlia over grown on rivers edge by stone bridge, 23rd July
item.description:
There’s a massive budlia bush by the edge of the river by the stone bridge which needs cutting back because you can’t see passed it to see the river and the metal bridge like you coukd before. It’s a mess !!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Twyford Place Walkway, 23rd July
item.description:
Street vendors are assembling a sale unit in the middle of the walkway. They are doing construction work and causing noise in what seems a very informal and potentially dangerous way. Is this installation authorised?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 64-68, Kingsway, Holborn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
